PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02882018-03-12,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of DOMINIQUE HAMEL of Montréal, Quebec, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 1, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of DOMINIQUE HAMEL of Montréal, Quebec, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 1, 2018.
